subject: Update format-note.js to match redesigned clean note format
description: format-note.js still uses the OLD note format (AI CALL SUMMARY banner). The redesign-call-record-association spec defines a cleaner format: `[MM/DD h:mma] Caller Name (Company)` header with From/To fields, URGENT prefix for emergencies, and streamlined layout. Update code and tests to match the spec.
